message.content: {"given_definition_quality":75,"better_definition":"father; dad; papa","sentence":"爸爸在家。","image_prompt":"A soft apocalypse animation style image showing a friendly Chinese father (爸爸) standing in a simple home environment, smiling gently, evoking warmth and safety. The scene appears humble and cozy, with subtle otherworldly post-apocalyptic coloring and atmosphere, but everyday life continuing calmly.","sentence_translation":"Dad is at home."}
